setup.title: Setup
setup.description: Select an XML file containing the data of your previous business period. It will be suffixed with result. E.g.: "179_7_result.xml"
setup.xmlAlertDanger: XML could not be loaded. Please ensure that it's name is "...result.xml" and has the required data within.
setup.xmlAlertSuccess: XML has been loaded into the system succesfully.
setup.msgNextPage: Your data has been stored within the system. Click the button below to move to the next page or select an option from the sidebar.

export.title: Export
export.description: You can export your data here.
export.tooltipViewDecisions: Before exporting, verify that the correct data is present.
export.descriptionDownloadData: Download the generated .xml file and upload it to the SCS afterward.

homepage.title: Welcome to Sisyphus
homepage.description: Professional Production Management Software by G8-Softworks.

disposition.title: Disposition
disposition.tableRowInput_error: Value must be greater than or equal to zero
